description: Marko LeBeau has the best hands in the massage business. It's not so much his technique, or even his skill, as much as it is that he's always willing to go the extra mile. So when Trystan Bull throws his back out playing tennis, a friend refers him to Marko, and he takes the advice. Boy is he glad that he did! As soon as Marko puts his hands on him, Trystan realizes that his reputation is deserved. And when Marko puts his mouth on Trystan's throbbing cock, he realizes that this will be one massage he'll be cumming back for, again and again and again.Enjoy!
title: Magic Hands
